name: Master Blacksmith's Legacy
info: Learn the ancient art of legendary weapon crafting.
dialogs: You want to learn the secrets of legendary crafting?
It took me decades to master these techniques.
First, you must understand the properties of rare metals.
Mithril, adamantium, orichalcum - each has unique properties.
Gather these materials and I'll teach you.
But beware - one mistake can ruin everything.
Are you prepared for this commitment?
